raw_text: Hydrochloric acid spill at Avon chemical plant A spill involving an estimated 5,000 gallons of 37% hydrochloric acid occurred at a manufacturing facility in Avon, Indiana. Operations may be disrupted.
title: Hydrochloric acid spill at Avon chemical plant
